FlowType.name: Non-export credit OOF
FlowType.description: Other Official Flows, excl. export credits.

FlowType.name: Officially supported export credits
FlowType.description: Officially supported export credits. Covers both official direct export credits and private export credits under official guarantee or insurance.

FlowType.name: Private grants
FlowType.description: made by NGOs and other civil society organisations (e.e. philantropic foundations) based in the reporting DAC country

FlowType.name: Other Private flows at market terms
FlowType.description: Private long-term (i.e. over one-year maturity) capital transactions made by residents of DAC countries.

FlowType.name: Other flows
FlowType.description: e.g. non-ODA component of peacebuilding operations)
